name: 艾莉·玛丽·埃文斯
name_full: 艾莉·玛丽·埃文斯 Allie Marie Evans
introduction: The Los Angeles-based but Canadian born actress is already a role model for a new generation of fans. Combining youthful creativity and a strong sense of direction today Allie has cultivated a impressive social following of over half a million across platforms, while staying true to her unique vision as an actress and filmmaker. Adored for her honest short films, Allie has taken the next step in her career by staring in several feature films including her role in Rock Steady Row that landed her Slamdance 2018 Winner of Best Narrative Feature
